Blog.post: yday ntg much happened...last day of da semester.. =( so faz holz d...i'll juz b stuck at home...aihz... well...we did 'sumthing' n was kinda l8 4 mathz [1st lesson] yday..hehe. um..saw sum ppl in da hall - again.. koff... koff... hrm...i realize hiephin is getting smarter...lol....lol... 4 doing 'sumthing'.. SY came n return my foto... -.-" aihzz....im gonna have tuition on monday.. tuesday... n wednesday... -sick. =( my s2pid tcher is so unreasonable.. crapping 24/7... 4 eva complaining bout us... at least if wat shez sayz is true nvm la.. but she alwiz simply fitnah us! ish.... last nite sms ju lin til 3am... haha...cudnt last til 6am la.. XD... er...ntg else 2 rite d la... im sooooo bored now..... no1 on9.... ntg 2 do..... =(

tueday ~ pn.mala made victoria n i walk lyk mad 2 find pn.hafizan.. we had 2 go back 2 pn.hafizan several tymz coz we kept 4getting wat she s8... aihz.. ~ haha... pn.hafizan snapped at lih chai really funnily wen lih chai gave her da sick look coz pn.hafizan s8 her art was lyk "org tak pernah belajar buat".. XD ~ vic gave * anonymous * gal a new name.. itz 2 long 4 me 2 remember... lol...~ wednesday ~ hrm....went n collect *sum1's* [erhem* erhem* mrsS ..] report card 4rom jo anne ... aihz.. dunno y she can 4get 2 take her report back oso... summore she cannot remember where she sat.. den muz ask ppl 2 search evry table.. haihz.. menyusahkan betul.. surprisely, vic didnt call jo anne "nimcompoop" 2day... =p... passed julin my class foto n my fwens were complaining coz dey s8 they look horrible but i looked worse la... um..we got da cloth 4 kh 2day... not nyc la... hehe. thursday ~ erm...hahaha... samantha tan snapped at rebecca 4 "adding salt n pepper".. [wateva dat means] in2 wat she was telling me... aihz.. hiephin rote sumting on my hand yday n da ink stil cannot cum out.. wat dumb red ink did she use... ish... hrm.. got da candid foto 4rom jo anne again coz waiteng wanted 2 c it... oh ya..n thnx 2 waiteng sum 2M'z came 2 me n s8 there was sumting written on science lab table.. onli 2dayz ago my other frenz saw sumting written on da wall [outside 2S] oso... now im starting 2 wonder where else they rote those crap summore... n 2 waiteng.. if u think it is juz 4 fun... i dun c any fun in riting this stuffz.. well... mayb ill consider riting sum stuffz "juz 4 fun" oso, k? hrm...my s2pid tuition tcher is complaining again... simply saying stuff i didnt even do.. well.. xcept 4 da "im-gonna-confisc8-ur-hp" thingy.. well.. she sux... =p giv so much hw summore.. wat did we [me...mrsS.. n SL..] do 2 deserve diz? lol... sounds familiar... XD

erm... 2day was boring! as usual.... haha.. vic started yelling " nim-com-poop !" n "anonymous form6 gal!!!" at sum ppl at da beginning at skool... lol... i doubt ppl wud understand wat she meant by " nimcompoop ".. lol had da dumb "assembly" at 1.00 at da bengkel lama.. boring... zzz.... 2H very semangat.. aih.. i dun think my class will eva b diz "nice".. 1 of da 2H gal cudnt answer so she had 2 pick up rubbish 4rom d toilet....* eww * n da whole clazz volunteer 2 go 2getha... =) we didnt have any lessons b4 recess... xcept 4 s2pid sejarah....zzz....... rama alwiz has 2 come -.-" after recess got pjk lo... had 2 sit-upz... haihzzz... i h8 sit-upz... den got assembly again... ying chiet kept staring at PL ...lol... creepy betul ... i think she turn n stared at least 12 times.. [ 12 rite, HC ?..]...haha.. wen i asked SL how was her movie d8 wif HC .. i s8 D8 ....n SL s8 it was ok.. n she DID NOT deny d8 ... erhem* erhem*.. [hm... juz saw HC'z blog... where got i luff til cannot stand ar? haha... but it was REALLY hilarious leh... wen u gonna jump again..? XD]

im so sleepy now... n so bored...... aihz...... juz now i went 2 skool 2 c da chinese singing competition thingy..... da s2pid blue mark on my hand stil nv cum out yet..=p hie phin n su juan oso entered d competiton.. lol! hm...vic was so darn noisy... wen ppl ask 2 keep quiet... [in mandarin].. vic shout summore.. den evry1 turn n look... aihz... den l8r even worse... vic read 1 of my sms... she thot ju lin sent dat msg wan.. den she shouted... [so loud...] den she saw 'sender : jo anne'... she screamed more.. [even louder] -.-" so many ppl turn n look at us... aihz.... but actuali its dat sian yee who rote dat msg wan... vic buat kecoh saja... hrm... den vic started riting sum crap on sum paper/ bk n kept throwing at *some* form4z sitting bhind dere...[who got hubungan sulit wif each other wan....].. *some* form4z deez dayz r so giler n lan c...lyk 2 say form2z diz.. form2z dat...lol =p.. n alwiz got hubungan sulit.. wif *some* anonymous ppl... n *some* body never even deny dat she haz hubungan sulit wif her bez fwen... lol... den mrsS fon.. kacau onli...mun yie was singing dat tym.. she ask me 2 tape da gay "guy" show 4 her.. i cudnt hear wateva dat tard was saying actuali coz it was kinda noisy... l8r on.. HC..SL..vic n i walked 2 da mpk 2 get info 4 sum dumb geography project... vic s8 dat da 4 of us looks lyk sum kidz dat ran away 4rom home... lol... well... i dun really think we looked liddat la.... =p

got my class pic 2day... i look so cacat in both of d pic... lol.. n i learnt sumting 2day.. do NOT use ink pen 2 rite on fotoz especially wen u knoe a tard lyk mrsS aka rebecca will b riting on it after u do...! i JUZ told her NOT 2 smear my riting n RIGHT at dat moment she put her hands on DAT part... -.-" n smeared it..! hahahaa... wen it was bout 6.30, PL.. nishaan, hueyching n i went out 4 duty as usual... n Azra asked nishaan 2 get her file 4 her 4rom her class.. Azra was in d hall la... so we went to 2P n papaya was teaching dere... den we asked chia jean [who sat near d door] 2 pass Azra'z file... n we hid bhind d door so papaya cudnt c us.. well.. xcept 4 PL! she stood DIRECTLY at d door.. [blurly].. n papaya was staring DIRECTLY at her... HC kept telling her not 2 stand dere but PL was 2 blurr.. den sum 2P's stared at us oso... [embarassing onli... aih].. so HC quickly pulled me away n fled while PL n nishaan was stil dere trying 2 get d file.. n wen dey got it.. man.. dey were SO smart.. dey threw da file 2 Azra 4rom d quadrangle.. [or wateva u call dat place btween blockA n blockB] 2 da laluan bestari... like la it wud work... da whole file dropped.. [like i xpected...aih] n all da papers came flying down... [so embarassing... but luckily HC n i alredi cabut..] n papaya went 2wards d door n stood dere n watched them... aikz.. summore PL luffed DAMN loudly while collecting d papers... l8r on.... i think HC decided 2 act like a koala bear n she jumped on PL... [2 piggy-back her i guess].. -.-" HC tol PL she was gonna jump on her n PL was 2 blur again n s8 "ok..." i guess PL didnt really knoe how HC's "jump" was like... den HC jumped on her n both of them dropped on da road near d round-about. it was SO darn funny... i cunt stop luffing... PL's face was SO red.. lol.. ahahahhahaha.... =p

hey.. i didnt blog 4 quite a few dayz adi... neway ntg interesting really happened la. hmm.. letz c.. da weekend was boring... as usual.. weekends r alwiz boring 4 me =p monday... hm.. got my 1st 'B'... 4 seni... =( haha... dun care la.. my art really sux... yday ntg much happened i guess.... xcept we went around da whole skool looking 4 hueyching 's lil mun yie n she was in da wakaf all along! ish! 4rom blockA ... 2... blockB...2... blockC... 2 ....blockD.. n she was in da wakaf! i wonder y 1S was in da wakaf wen they shud b having lessons at dat tym.. well... 2day... erm.. as usual we wud walk around doing ntg.. den suddenly wen we were walking past pn.khariah's lab... [er.. rather noisily... PL was blurly smacking us wif her "mahjong" paper...], pn.khariah came out n went "Sshhhh!"... scary la... but i started luffing... yday i think we were equally noisy wen we passed by da lab oso.. thnx 2 PL yelling "whoa....!!!" wen vic was trying 2 ask her 2 lower down her voice coz there were lessons going on in d lab.. n den during recess PL was caught fighting wif "chipmunk" aka nabilah.. over..err... da canteen drink... n pn.khariah suddenly appeared n s8 "jgn bergaduh la!"... lol.. dat was funny... bt dat dumb "chipmunk" is seriously a tard la... . hmm... den 4 KH... we had 2 do da pola 4 da blouse dat we r gonna sew.. aihz... oh ya.. as usual.. rebecca 4gets EVRYTHING... [well... xcept 4 samuel n gayz...] so vic had 2 ask eliza 2 buy da "mahjong" paper 4 rebecca.. n well.. rebecca was d only 1 having brown "mahjong" paper in class... evry1 else got white wan.. after dat vic started doing voodoo on sharon n hajar.. hahaha.... i dun think da voodoo worked... sharon teoh willingly gave vic her hair 2 do voodoo... how smart... n she knew vic was planning 2 do voodoo wif...err... a sponge [wif boobs... hahhaha] in a err... dress?.. sum thread..[which she imagines is pixie's dust.. n magic powder] she poked da stupid sponge wif needles...+ sharon's hair..n vic kept looking at sharon 2 c if neting happened 2 her..but ntg did. ..lol... haha... i knoe itz lame but itz kinda funny since we have ntg better else 2 do in class..haha... tuition was kinda funny 2day... rebecca kept toking 2 her compass.. wat a tard.. "dun move... dun move ar!" kinda freaky la.. but im used 2 her crazee self... n she had 2 annoy me by singing "my band" throughout d whole tuition.. but i was thinking bout dat song 2 at dat tym.. weird... aih.. rebecca's freaky i told ya.. =p

hey... tak sangka i manage 2 get A 4 sejarah! haha.. i thot i flunked it! aihz.. yday i cudnt go on9 coz of dumb tuition replacement.. i had no idea how 2 draw da loci or wateva.. but it was a good thing my tcher nv asked our markz! or else.. she wud b lyk "u got 97? wat about ur other 3 markz arh?" n if she saw i cancelled my correct answer [i put at first] ..n.. put da wrong wan l8r [which is y i lost 3 darn markz]... she'd probably will kill me! aihz.. neway.. skool was boring.. [bsides d part hueyching was at laluan bestari using pei ling'z bottle 2 splash water at ne1 walking by... haha... n hueyching is mad.. shouting **** u at ppl... even ppl she dunno... gila..haha] da ceramah bout dadah was SOOO boring... at least we skipped sejarah la.. dat was d onli good point.. well..2day got back moral paper...90... n sejarah.. managed 2 get 83.. phew! we tried asking pn.rafiah 4 sum markz 4 another fren.. n she was finding her text book [2 refer 4 answerz] lyk mad... "mana buku tekz saya? pasti tertinggal di 2M.. aih..mereka takkan pulangkan punya la... selalu curi buku saya! dah 2 kali"..*she was mumbling*.. she kinda reminds me of hajar sumtymz.. rebecca n pei ling were so sleepy 2day... vic tried all sortz of way 2 wake them up.. she even shouted "nishaan shitted in her pantz!!!"... but 2 bad.. they cudnt b bothered 2 listen... instead.. nishaan heard n she err... didnt really see d funny side of it.. i poured glue all over rebecca'z hand.. well..dat woke her up... n my pen was all sticky... wif glue... i was wiping da glue on my pen on d stairz railingz n out of nowhere pn.mala appeared n said.. "aik.. buat apa..?".. err.. i dun think she knew wat i was doing n vic quickly said we were going 2 d toilet.. but pn.mala said.. "tanda dekat sana.. kamu pergi mana..?" n we were lyk.. "err....wash hand first" coz we were heading 2wards da bilik cetak way..aih.. not 2 c pregnant fella ,k?

haha.. i juz did sumthing uzing's rebecca's name.. lol.. if she finds out she'll kill me... lol.. aihz.. got back KH, english n geography markz 2day.. i really h8 getting back resultz...coz all my markz suck. science i got another 2 markz coz mr teh marked wrongly...so itz 95% now... ntg much happened 2day la.. boring as usual.. diz tym rebecca decided not 2 giv attendance again... so vic, pl n i had 2 go 2 da canteen 2 find 4 pn mala... neway.. it was a good thing rebecca didnt go.. or else she wud've ate all d canteen food...n there will b no food 4 us 2 buy....we had ntg else 2 do..so we played da 'name' game again la.. haha.. rebecca kept ending up wif da tree killer's lava.. hmm.. i dun think i need 2 mention d name hor?.. n hajar n SUM1 was d funniest pair! 1 so uncool... 1 so cool... lol... but i dun think i wud lyk 2 mention d name in case SUM1 getz jeles again... aih.. n i ended up wif SUM1... i wonder y nishaan had 2 pair up number 14 n 19... haihz... den i kena teased teruk.. how can she choose dat name..? got sooo many other names wat.. haha.. im so bored now.. so i juz hafta crap here la.. but i have no idea wat else 2 crap bout..! aih... bye! ;-p

tuition was sooo boring... thanx 2 rebecca n suling.. none of us did our hw as usual.. n den we had 2 do it in class.. shockingly.. rebecca n suling took at least 1/2hr longer 2 finish it up than me.. n i had ntg 2 do.. so i started playing wif da "disappearing ink"..n i put it all over suling's science exercise bk's cover... n ooh.. i was pretty sure it cud cum out but.. damn.. it didnt.. i hope hueyching will not kill me 2moro.. but i guez shez 2 bz wif her beloved mun yie 2 notiz any of diz at d moment.. [oh ya.. n hueyching,.. u shudnt have gone n yell "u r da much more rejected" at sum1 wen she said I luked rejected... aihz..] oh ya... n not 4getting rebecca.. she was sooo "nice", ya knoe.. she kept giving me da dirty look wen she knoes im sms-ing or wateva.. or sumtymz she'll juz sigh sooo loudly 2 attract da tcher'z attention... wen my tcher was toking bout "unique animalz dat attract tourists".. it really reminded me of rebecca... n wen suling said "rebecca,... UR husband, S****L.. will even sink in da 'dead sea'!" n rebecca replied.. "now onli u realize arh!?".. hmm... rebecca admitz its her husband?.. lol.. well.. wat about ur Guy now, rebecca??? im not saying u dumped him.. but i mean i guess u grabbed his gay partner... :-p

haha... 2day pn.hafizan gave sum really sarcastic but darn funny commentz bout our art dat we did 4 diz test.. my art sucked as usual but at least she cud recognize d "haunter" [a pokemon.. lol] i drew... i had no idea wat 2 draw so i drew dat thingy... actuali i planned 2 draw rebecca's face but it was kinda difficult so i changed my mind though rebecca's face wud hav been much better since d title was "mimpi ngeri"! hie phin has been so freaking annoying 2day... aihz.. she grabbed d darn paper 4rom me but luckily none of them manage 2 read it... aih.. n i scolded them n they were lyk so shocked.. wateva la.. i juz dropped d piece of paper i tore n da ketua kebersihan started yelling "u throw paper on d floor summore, im gonna denda u!".. wat da..? i mean im not even 4rom 2S, k? lame... got back bm n mathz paper... ish! dat darn mathz question! i put da right answer adi.. den i cancelled.. n got wrong.. i lost 3 markz 4 dat.. aihz... gtg now.. got tuition l8r... shit la.. i didnt do tuition hw.. im gonna get it 4rom my tcher...aihz..

haha... i almoz 4got.. sum1 kept repeating diz phrase.. --> "I am who I am,and I don't give a damn about who you want me to be... ".. lol.. though dat tard cudnt remember d whole line nicely.. she kept saying d wrong words... lol.. n now im not really hinting, am i.., REBECCA ? oopz... im toking lyk victoria.. - again.. ish! i better stop using vic'z word nemore... n im really so darn confused now... haihz.. kla.. datz all 4 2day..

juz got back 4rom skool... hrm... so bored - again. oh yeah.. yday was frenship day! almoz 4gotten bout it..haha. well... so much 4 "happy" frenship day... aih.. got back science paper 2day.. luckily i didnt flunk it. wasnt in a good mood 2day.. n those ppl who r alwiz crowding reali pissed me off.. sasha brought diz cool "disappearing ink" 2day.. haha..had sum fun wif it.. my frenz had been singing "my happy ending" d whole day!.. now dat song'z in my head - again.. *so much 4 my happy ending... oh oh.. oh.oh.. oh...* lol... wat da..? dat idiot tried 2 add me again at frenster? tak puas hati izit i rejected once adi..? aih..

hey. ne1 who read my blog i posted last nite [which i juz deleted] 4get bout it , k? im listening 2 avril'z "get over it" now.. but im stil so bored... ntg much happened 2day la.. diz morning jo anne sms-ed me.. coz last nite she fell asleep 1/2way wen chatting.. lol.. ppl seem 2 fall asleep often wen chatting 2 me... juz now i saw avril'z "my happy ending" vid twice.. vry nice!.... *itz nice 2 knoe dat u were there..n thanx 4 acting like u care.. n making me feel like i was d onli 1... itz nice 2 knoe we had it all.. n thanx 4 watching as i fall.. n letting me knoe we were done..* aihz.. no mood 2 rite neting else la.. bye

heyz... juz made diz blog 2day.. im so bored.. no1 is on9.. xcept waiteng la.. so i decided 2 make diz thingy.. aih.. went 2 skool 4 at bout 8am 2day.. once i entered d skool, i saw rebecca, victoria, pei ling n huey ching yelling n luffing lyk hell.. *scary..*.. coz kononnya they bet dat i will cum same tym wif sumbody.. dunno watz wrong wif them... can't they spent more tym saving d treez? haha.. now i've gone nutz like victoria.. lol. i followed rebecca n pei ling 2 pingpong meeting n we got scolding 4 being so darn noisy..lol.. so boring there... watched them play oni.. huey ching n ju lin played damn "nice"... haha.. den i sms-ed ju lin la.. n i fell asleep 1/2way sms-ing.. hahaa... n she oso fell asleep.. lol... :-p
